food.name: Buttermilk Pancakes
food.des: Three large buttermilk pancakes. Comes with maple syrup and pads of butter.

food.name: Chicken & Waffles
food.des: Two fluffy waffles, covered in maple syrup and three pieces of freshly fried chicken.

food.name: Cheese, Mushroom, and Bacon Omelette
food.des: Three farm-fresh eggs scrambled. Mixed with provolone cheese, chopped portobello mushrooms, and applewood-smoked bacon.

food.name: French Toast with Assorted Fruits
food.des: Two thick pieces of french toast covered in powdered sugar and maple syrup. Topped with strawberries, blueberries, and bananas.

food.name: Avocado Toast
food.des: Two pieces of toasted whole-wheat bread. Topped with mashed avocado with smoked paprika and a soft-boiled egg.

food.name: Eggs Benedict
food.des: An English muffin topped with Canadian bacon, a poached egg, and house-made hollandaise sauce.
